Actions.Name: Portal - Check Signing Status
Actions.Description: Returns document's information with signing status.

Actions.Name: Portal - Create Signing
Actions.Description: Create a PDF, ASIC or ADOC file for signing.

Actions.Name: Portal - Delete Signing
Actions.Description: The document will be removed from the owner's account. It will remain accessible to other participants.

Actions.Name: Portal - Delete Signing For All
Actions.Description: The document will be removed from the owner's account and from other participants' who haven't signed the document yet.

Actions.Name: Portal - Get Signing List
Actions.Description: Returns a list of all documents available to the account owner.

Actions.Name: Portal - Send Reminder
Actions.Description: Allows to send a reminder e-mail for participant, only if person has not signed document yet.

Actions.Name: Portal - Seal signing
Actions.Description: Document will be sealed with your organizations' electronic seal. Please contact our support at developers@dokobit.com to get a qualified certificate for e-sealing.

Actions.Name: Portal - Delete participant from signing
Actions.Description: Access to the document will be revoked for the indicated participant.

Actions.Name: Portal - Share signing
Actions.Description: Indicated participants will gain access to the document with the selected role.
